remarks: Subtraction of a vector from itself.  ( ~ hvsubid analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodsubeq0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodsubeq0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lmodsubeq0.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lmodsubid $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V ) -> ( A .- A ) = .0. ) $.
